name: The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2
description: The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2, (known in Japan as ミッキーマウスII, Mickey Mouse II) and known in Europe either as Hugo or simply Mickey Mouse, is a video game developed by Kemco for the Game Boy. It is the sequel to the 1989 Nintendo Entertainment System and Game Boy game The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle.
